Nightlight

Nightlight was weak. All her experience had taking a toll. She =
didnt listened what Rodimus said and she added "He deceived me... I tought =
he was you... He was a clone and he belived that he was you... All this tim=
e they mus have making fun of us"

> RODIMUS smiled=
 down at NIGHTLIGHT as he shifted to his robotic form

 NIGHTLIGHT in his arms. "Yes it is truely me."

entrance to the ARK as he watched the others
> make their way back. RODIMUS=
 stood much taller and broader than
> before, his robot mode having changed=
 almost as much as his beastmode
> had done. He now stood at nearly 15 feet=

> different than before.
>

CY walked up to RODIMUS, "I can see that you

said in cold factual tones.

n you know." He looked at
> the other MAXIMALS as they came in but kept his=
 voice low, pitched
> just for LEGACY to hear, although it is possible that=
 NIGHTLIGHT might

You and some of

>

"
>

>=
 seen the MATRIX, and it tells me that there are more changes coming."
> He=
 said grimly both to LEGACY ads well as NIGHTLIGHT.

u have passed beyond my knowledge of the future to
